component.name: getUserClicks
component.description: Returns the number of clicks on all of the authenticated user's bitly links.

component.name: getCountries
component.description: Returns metrics about the countries referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's bitly links.

component.name: getReferrers
component.description: Returns metrics about the pages referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's bitly links.

component.name: getReferringDomains
component.description: Returns metrics about the domains referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's bitly links.

component.name: getShareCounts
component.description: Returns the number of shares by the authenticated user in a given time period.

component.name: getPopularLinks
component.description: Returns the authenticated user's most-clicked bitly links in a given time period.
